Unfortunately Mr Wegrzyn, your threats to me constitute criminal harassment=
.=C2=A0 
Here's what you said:

"Get off Franks back...Or I'll find you and=
 you dont want that...get with
 it or GET LOST...Thats my opion,let me know=
 Frank and I'll take a road 
trip.I got laid off today and I'm in the mood =
to screw something or 
someone up !!!!!"

Mr Wegrzyn. did you mean that thr=
eat? I am considering filing a police report, but I am willing to give you =
a chance to reexplain what you meant, or take it back, since as you said, y=
ou did get laid off and all.

d beer,anyone want to join me.?????

Thanks April. I also don't =
understand the vehemence of the comments to me.=C2=A0=C2=A0 All I can figur=
e, is that some people here have had their deeply held beliefs attacked pre=
viously by those calling themselves or acting like skeptics or scientists.=
=C2=A0 They compare me to them, and so connect my tests and questions as he=
ralding more attacks on their beliefs.

I don't in the least condone attack=
ing people's beliefs, much less attacking them personally (as unfortunately=
 people here are attacking me now).

ot the skeptics, nor the believers. The outcome of the tests won't mean any=
thing to anyone except those who wish to remain objective. I do not underst=
and why some people here are so threatened by these tests.

So why do you f=
eel it necessary to attack me?

my personal results do not show anything paranormal,=C2=A0 I ask experts to=

earn.=C2=A0 I have contributed a testing process so far, run several public=
 tests, and even though they were not positive results, I did not "tout it =
all over the web".=C2=A0 I have not criticized.=C2=A0 I just don't automati=
cally believe everything people tell me.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
I don't understand w=
hy you would think that should be reason to be kicked out of the group.
